coreAtributes.name: Mailed Aketon
coreAtributes.description: A heavy-duty jacket made of thick, quilted cloth, with a mail jacket sewn in with leather thongs. Designed to be worn beneath armour, the mailed aketon is nonetheless effective armour all on its lonesome.

displacementText.playerSelf: You unlace the back of your Mailed Aketon, and remove it.
displacementText.playerNPC: You unlace the back of [npc.name]'s Mailed Aketon, and remove it.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You tear open [npc.name]'s Mailed Aketon, and haul it off.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] unlaces the back of their Mailed Aketon, and removes it.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] unlaces the back of your Mailed Aketon, and removes it.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] tears open the back of your Mailed Aketon, and hauls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] unlaces the back of [npc2.name]'s Mailed Aketon, and removes it.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] tears open the back of [npc2.name]'s Mailed Aketon, and hauls it off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You don your Mailed Aketon, and lace up the back.
replacementText.playerNPC: You assist [npc.name] in donning their Mailed Aketon, and lace it up.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You shove [npc.name] into their Mailed Aketon, and lace it up.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] dons their Mailed Aketon, and laces up the back.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] assists you in donning your Mailed Aketon, and laces up the back.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] shoves you into your Mailed Aketon, and laces it up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] assists [npc2.name] in donning their Mailed Aketon, and laces up the back.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] shoves [npc2.name] into their Mailed Aketon, and laces it up.
